mapper.insert: insert into SEC_HYDR (ID, SECTION_CODE, ELEVATION_SYSTEM, RESERVIOR, WATER_LEVEL, WATER_FLOW, WATER_TEMPERATURE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, SECTION_ID, REGION, AGENT1, AGENT2, AGENT3, SECTION_NUM, RIVER_SYSTEM1, RIVER_SYSTEM2, RIVER_SYSTEM3) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elevationSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waterLevel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterFlow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterTemperature,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riverSystem1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riverSystem2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riverSystem3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update SEC_HYDR set SECTION_CODE = #{sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEVATION_SYSTEM = #{elevationSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVIOR = #{reservior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WATER_LEVEL = #{waterLevel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WATER_FLOW = #{waterFlow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WATER_TEMPERATURE = #{waterTemperature,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT1 = #{agent1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT2 = #{agent2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT3 = #{agent3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_NUM = #{sectionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIVER_SYSTEM1 = #{riverSystem1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIVER_SYSTEM2 = #{riverSystem2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIVER_SYSTEM3 = #{riverSystem3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_CODE, ELEVATION_SYSTEM, RESERVIOR, WATER_LEVEL, WATER_FLOW, WATER_TEMPERATURE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, SECTION_ID, REGION, AGENT1, AGENT2, AGENT3, SECTION_NUM, RIVER_SYSTEM1, RIVER_SYSTEM2, RIVER_SYSTEM3 from SEC_HYDR where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SECTION_CODE, ELEVATION_SYSTEM, RESERVIOR, WATER_LEVEL, WATER_FLOW, WATER_TEMPERATURE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, SECTION_ID, REGION, AGENT1, AGENT2, AGENT3, SECTION_NUM, RIVER_SYSTEM1, RIVER_SYSTEM2, RIVER_SYSTEM3 from SEC_HYDR
